price: 你应当遵循从你的养主降示你的〔经典〕，安拉确是彻知你们的行为的。
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kāna bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
